channel.title: Entertainment,More on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Entertainment,More on NewsStreet

item.title: Indian singer-composer Papon to launch all-India concert tour from Dibrugarh on Nov 3
item.description: Indian singer-composer Papon to launch all-India concert tour from Dibrugarh on Nov 3 Healing hearts through his music, the multifaceted singer Papon has announced the dates for his musical tour on his social media handles.

item.title: Lingayat Seer Suicide Case: Honey-trapped swami's conversation with woman surfaces
item.description: Lingayat Seer Suicide Case: Honey-trapped swami’s conversation with woman surfaces Police stated that Basavalinga Sree was honey trapped systematically and evidence collected against him by a group of influential people.

item.title: Punjab: World's largest diya lit in Mohali to promote message of global peace and unity
item.description: Punjab: World’s largest diya lit in Mohali to promote message of global peace and unity Around 10,000 citizens, including 4,000 residents of Hero Homes pooled in approximately 3,560 liters of organic and diya-appropriate oils.

item.title: Being vocal about your feelings can sometimes backfire, says Indian acreess Sayani Gupta
item.description: Being vocal about your feelings can sometimes backfire, says Indian acreess Sayani Gupta Sayani said, “It always backfires but that’s not the point.
